entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
